headline: Baxter International Inc. (BAX): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Baxter International Inc. on Value investing subreddit by Mr-Gambini. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on BAX. Baxter International Inc.’s share was trading at $19.29 as of December 17th. BAX’s forward P/E was 8.12 according to Yahoo Finance. Baxter International (BAX) is a quintessential “boring but essential” medtech company operating in oligopolistic markets for […]
